basics.name: Yhanessa Anne Sales
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2023.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI
courses: Intro to Computer Science I & II (ICS 111 & ICS 211)
Discrete Math for CS I & II (ICS 141 & ICS 241)

highlights: Supervise elementary school students after school

volunteer.organization: The Association for Computing Machinery at the University of Hawaii at Manoa (ACM@Manoa)
volunteer.summary: A computer science student organization open to all majors and experience levels
Play Clarinet of different genres of music
Test and provide feedback and review on a company's website or app. I have to share my thoughts and opinions to help further improve the company's user experience

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: UH Band Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded to UH Manoa Students who are registered for UH Marching Band and one of the three UH concert bands

awards.title: Dean's List
awards.summary: Awarded to Undergraduate students who earned a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 or more credits

awards.title: Garden Island Federal Credit Union Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded to 3 high school seniors who demonstrated academic achievement and financial need
